mapper.insert: insert into iplog (id, ip, loginState, username, loginInfoId, loginType, loginTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginstate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logininfoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logintype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update iplog set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginState = #{loginstate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginInfoId = #{logininfoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, loginType = #{logintype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, loginTime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, ip, loginState, username, loginInfoId, loginType, loginTime from iplog
